7// driver_utils.h : provides more information about current driver.
8
9#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_DRIVER_UTILS_H_
10#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_DRIVER_UTILS_H_
11
12#include "common/platform.h"
13#include "libANGLE/angletypes.h"
14
15namespace rx
16{
17
18enum VendorID : uint32_t
19{
20 VENDOR_ID_UNKNOWN = 0x0,
21 VENDOR_ID_AMD = 0x1002,
22 VENDOR_ID_ARM = 0x13B5,
23 // Broadcom devices won't use PCI, but this is their Vulkan vendor id.
24 VENDOR_ID_BROADCOM = 0x14E4,
25 VENDOR_ID_GOOGLE = 0x1AE0,
26 VENDOR_ID_INTEL = 0x8086,
27 VENDOR_ID_NVIDIA = 0x10DE,
28 VENDOR_ID_POWERVR = 0x1010,
29 // This is Qualcomm PCI Vendor ID.
30 // Android doesn't have a PCI bus, but all we need is a unique id.
31 VENDOR_ID_QUALCOMM = 0x5143,
32 VENDOR_ID_SAMSUNG = 0x144D,
33 VENDOR_ID_VMWARE = 0x15AD,
34};
35
36enum AndroidDeviceID : uint32_t
37{
38 ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_UNKNOWN = 0x0,
39 ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_NEXUS5X = 0x4010800,
40 ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_PIXEL2 = 0x5040001,
41 ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_PIXEL1XL = 0x5030004,
42 ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_SWIFTSHADER = 0xC0DE,
43};
44
45inline bool IsAMD(uint32_t vendorId)
46{
47 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_AMD;
48}
49
50inline bool IsARM(uint32_t vendorId)
51{
52 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_ARM;
53}
54
55inline bool IsBroadcom(uint32_t vendorId)
56{
57 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_BROADCOM;
58}
59
60inline bool IsIntel(uint32_t vendorId)
61{
62 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_INTEL;
63}
64
65inline bool IsGoogle(uint32_t vendorId)
66{
67 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_GOOGLE;
68}
69
70inline bool IsNvidia(uint32_t vendorId)
71{
72 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_NVIDIA;
73}
74
75inline bool IsPowerVR(uint32_t vendorId)
76{
77 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_POWERVR;
78}
79
80inline bool IsQualcomm(uint32_t vendorId)
81{
82 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_QUALCOMM;
83}
84
85inline bool IsVMWare(uint32_t vendorId)
86{
87 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_VMWARE;
88}
89
90inline bool IsSamsung(uint32_t vendorId)
91{
92 return vendorId == VENDOR_ID_SAMSUNG;
93}
94
95inline bool IsNexus5X(uint32_t vendorId, uint32_t deviceId)
96{
97 return IsQualcomm(vendorId) && deviceId == ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_NEXUS5X;
98}
99
100inline bool IsPixel1XL(uint32_t vendorId, uint32_t deviceId)
101{
102 return IsQualcomm(vendorId) && deviceId == ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_PIXEL1XL;
103}
104
105inline bool IsPixel2(uint32_t vendorId, uint32_t deviceId)
106{
107 return IsQualcomm(vendorId) && deviceId == ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_PIXEL2;
108}
109
110inline bool IsSwiftshader(uint32_t vendorId, uint32_t deviceId)
111{
112 return IsGoogle(vendorId) && deviceId == ANDROID_DEVICE_ID_SWIFTSHADER;
113}
114
115const char *GetVendorString(uint32_t vendorId);
116
117// Intel
118class IntelDriverVersion
119{
120 public:
121 // Currently, We only provide the constructor with one parameter. It mainly used in Intel
122 // version number on windows. If you want to use this class on other platforms, it's easy to
123 // be extended.
124 IntelDriverVersion(uint16_t lastPart);
125 bool operator==(const IntelDriverVersion &);
126 bool operator!=(const IntelDriverVersion &);
127 bool operator<(const IntelDriverVersion &);
128 bool operator>=(const IntelDriverVersion &);
129
130 private:
131 uint16_t mVersionPart;
132};
133
134bool IsIvyBridge(uint32_t DeviceId);
135bool IsHaswell(uint32_t DeviceId);
136bool IsBroadwell(uint32_t DeviceId);
137bool IsCherryView(uint32_t DeviceId);
138bool IsSkylake(uint32_t DeviceId);
139bool IsBroxton(uint32_t DeviceId);
140bool IsKabylake(uint32_t DeviceId);
141
142// Platform helpers
143inline bool IsWindows()
144{
145#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
146 return true;
147#else
148 return false;
149#endif
150}
151
152inline bool IsLinux()
153{
154#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_LINUX)
155 return true;
156#else
157 return false;
158#endif
159}
160
161inline bool IsApple()
162{
163#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_APPLE)
164 return true;
165#else
166 return false;
167#endif
168}
169
170inline bool IsMac()
171{
172#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_APPLE) && defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_MACOS)
173 return true;
174#else
175 return false;
176#endif
177}
178
179inline bool IsFuchsia()
180{
181#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_FUCHSIA)
182 return true;
183#else
184 return false;
185#endif
186}
187
188inline bool IsIOS()
189{
190#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_IOS)
191 return true;
192#else
193 return false;
194#endif
195}
196
197bool IsWayland();
198bool IsWin10OrGreater();
199
200struct OSVersion
201{
202 OSVersion();
203 OSVersion(int major, int minor, int patch);
204
205 int majorVersion = 0;
206 int minorVersion = 0;
207 int patchVersion = 0;
208};
209bool operator==(const OSVersion &a, const OSVersion &b);
210bool operator!=(const OSVersion &a, const OSVersion &b);
211bool operator<(const OSVersion &a, const OSVersion &b);
212bool operator>=(const OSVersion &a, const OSVersion &b);
213
214OSVersion GetMacOSVersion();
215
216OSVersion GetiOSVersion();
217
218OSVersion GetLinuxOSVersion();
219
220inline bool IsAndroid()
221{
222#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_ANDROID)
223 return true;
224#else
225 return false;
226#endif
227}
228
229int GetAndroidSDKVersion();
230
231} // namespace rx
232#endif // LIBANGLE_RENDERER_DRIVER_UTILS_H_
